TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SerializationContents extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of chart content to be serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The SerializationContents enumeration represents the chart content type to be serialized. This enumeration is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartSerializer.Content%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SerializationContents All = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Serialize all chart information. This includes all appearance properties and data point values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SerializationContents Appearance = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Serialize all appearance properties, such as color or line style, if they have non-default values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SerializationContents Data = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Serialize data values from all chart series. Does not include appearance properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SerializationContents Default = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Serialize all non-default chart content. This includes appearance properties, series and their data points, axis minimums/maximums, and so forth.
